content.rendered:
John has over 20 years’ experience in business development and marketing in engineering and consultancy sector, the last 12 being in renewables. Originally a marine engineer John has developed into leading profile in offshore wind, started and established two business units in renewables and until recently led the business development and marketing of OWC. Mr MacAskill is based in London, UK.

Contact

London | +44 7899 684 411
